plastic_bottle.instructions: Remove cap and label, rinse container. Place in yellow recycling bin.
plastic_bottle.tips: Check local Duales System Deutschland (DSD) guidelines for specific requirements.

DE.instructions: Entfernen Sie Deckel und Etikett, spülen Sie den Behälter aus. In die gelbe Tonne.

FR.instructions: Retirer le bouchon et l'étiquette, rincer le récipient. Placer dans le bac jaune.

glass_bottle.instructions: Remove cap and cork. Sort by color: clear, brown, or green glass containers.
glass_bottle.tips: Use designated glass collection points. Do not mix with window glass or mirrors.

aluminum_can.instructions: Empty completely and rinse. Place in designated metal recycling container.
aluminum_can.tips: Aluminum is infinitely recyclable - one of the most valuable recyclable materials.

paper_cup.instructions: Most paper cups have plastic lining - dispose in residual waste bin.
paper_cup.tips: Look for certified compostable cups which can go in organic waste in some regions.

food_waste.instructions: Place in brown organic waste bin. Remove any packaging first.
food_waste.tips: Composting reduces methane emissions from landfills significantly.

electronic_device.instructions: Take to WEEE collection point or electronics retailer for proper recycling.
electronic_device.tips: Contains valuable metals and hazardous materials requiring special handling.

battery.instructions: Return to collection point at shops or municipal facility. Never dispose in regular bins.
battery.tips: Batteries contain toxic materials and valuable metals for recovery.

coffee_pod.instructions: Most coffee pods are not recyclable due to mixed materials. Dispose in residual waste.
coffee_pod.tips: Consider reusable coffee systems or look for certified compostable pods.

cardboard_box.instructions: Flatten and remove tape/staples. Place in paper recycling container.
cardboard_box.tips: Cardboard is highly recyclable and reduces forest pressure when recycled.

plastic_bag.instructions: Take to designated plastic film collection points at supermarkets.
plastic_bag.tips: Never place in regular recycling - can jam sorting machinery.
